    • Reservoir Mass Balance Simulation with Package `outfloweR`

Run scenarions of a reservoir mass balance model

scenario.Rd

Run scenarions of a reservoir mass balance model

Usage

scenario(
  option = c("standard", "cold_inflow", "wb_top"),
  vol,
  t_strat,
  t_autumn,
  inflow,
  outflow,
  outflow_wb
)

Arguments

option

character, specifying the water inflow and water abstraction regime

vol

numeric value, volume of the reservoir (in Mio m3)

t_strat

numeric value, day of stratification onset

t_autumn

numeri value, end of stratification

inflow

numeric vector, inflow in Mio m3/d

outflow

numeric vector, outflow in Mio m3/d

outflow_wb

numeric vector, bottom outlet in Mio m3/d
